articles.title: Banksy superhero nurse painting sells for record price to fund NHS | DW | 23.03.2021 - DW (English)
articles.description: Christie's London sold a painting portraying a healthcare worker as a superhero for €19.5 million on Tuesday, the most ever paid for a work by Banksy, who donated the work to a Southhampton hospital last May.
